com.numericalmethod.suanshu.number.complex
Class ElementaryFunction

java.lang.Object
  com.numericalmethod.suanshu.number.complex.ElementaryFunction

public class ElementaryFunction
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains some elementary functions for complex number Complex. The references for the formulae can be found in the following.

See Also:
  • Wikipedia: Square roots of negative and complex numbers
  • Wikipedia: Logarithm
  • Wikipedia: Exponentiation
  • Wikipedia: Trigonometric functions
  • Wikipedia: Hyperbolic functions

Method Detail

sqrt

public static Complex sqrt(Complex z)
Square root of a complex number.

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
the square root of the number, if not NaN of INFINITY
See Also:
Wikipedia: Square roots of negative and complex numbers

log

public static Complex log(Complex z)
Natural logarithm of a complex number (a + bi).
ln(a + bi) = ln(r exp(i θ)) = ln(r) + i θ

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
ln(z)

exp

public static Complex exp(Complex z)
Exponential of a complex number (a + bi). 
 exp(a + bi) = exp(a) * [cos(b) + i sin(b)]
             = exp(b)cos(b) + i exp(a)sin(b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
ez

pow

public static Complex pow(Complex z1,
                          Complex z2)
z1 to the power z2.

(r exp(i θ)) ^ (a + bi) = r^a exp(-b θ) (cos(b ln(r) + a θ) + i sin(b ln(r) + a θ))

Parameters:
z1 - first complex number
z2 - second complex number
Returns:
z1z2

sin

public static Complex sin(Complex z)
Sine of a complex number (a + bi).
sin(a + bi) = sin(a)cosh(b) + i cos(a)sinh(b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
sin(z)

cos

public static Complex cos(Complex z)
Cosine of a complex number (a + bi).
cos(a + bi) = cos(a)cosh(b) - i sin(a)sinh(b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
cos(z)

tan

public static Complex tan(Complex z)
Tangent of a complex number (a + bi). 
                sin(2a) + i sinh(2a)
 tan(a + bi) = ----------------------
                 cos(2a) + cosh(2b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
tan(z)

asin

public static Complex asin(Complex z)
Inverse of sine.
arcsin(z) = -i ln(iz + sqrt(1 - z2))

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
sin-1(z)
See Also:
Inverse Sine from Wolfram MathWorld

acos

public static Complex acos(Complex z)
Inverse of cosine.
arccos(z) = pi / 2 + i ln(iz + sqrt(1 - z2)) = pi / 2 - arcsin(z)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
cos-1(z)
See Also:
Inverse Cosine from Wolfram MathWorld

atan

public static Complex atan(Complex z)
Inverse of tangent. 
              i
 arctan(z) = --- ( ln ( 1 - iz ) - ln ( 1 + iz) )
              2

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
tan-1(z)
See Also:
Inverse Tangent from Wolfram MathWorld

sinh

public static Complex sinh(Complex z)
Hyperbolic sine of a complex number (a + bi).
sinh(a + bi) = sinh(a)cos(b) + i cosh(a)sin(b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
sinh(z)

cosh

public static Complex cosh(Complex z)
Hyperbolic cosine of a complex number (a + bi).
cosh(a + bi) = cosh(a)cos(b) + i sinh(a)sin(b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
cosh(z)

tanh

public static Complex tanh(Complex z)
Hyperbolic tangent of a complex number (a + bi). 
                 sinh(2a) + i sin(2b)
 tanh(a + bi) = ----------------------
                  cosh(2a) + cos(2b)

Parameters:
z - a complex number
Returns:
tanh(z)
